statements: SELECT * FROM hydropower_projects;
SELECT project_name, total_cost FROM hydropower_projects;
SELECT project_name, completion_date FROM hydropower_projects WHERE total_cost > 1000000;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date FROM hydropower_projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, budgeted_cost FROM hydropower_projects WHERE budgeted_cost < total_cost;
SELECT project_name, total_cost FROM hydropower_projects WHERE total_cost > 100000 ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, total_cost FROM hydropower_projects WHERE budgeted_cost < total_cost ORDER BY project_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM hydropower_projects WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_id, project_name, total_cost FROM hydropower_projects WHERE project_name LIKE '%dam%' ORDER BY total_cost DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, completion_date FROM hydropower_projects WHERE total_cost > 50000 ORDER BY completion_date ASC;
SELECT project_name, budget FROM HydropowerProjects
SELECT location, project_name FROM HydropowerProjects
SELECT * FROM HydropowerProjects WHERE location = 'California'
SELECT id, start_date, end_date FROM HydropowerProjects
SELECT project_name, budget, start_date FROM HydropowerProjects
SELECT * FROM HydropowerProjects WHERE budget > 100000 ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT project_name, location, budget FROM HydropowerProjects WHERE location='California'
SELECT project_name, budget, start_date, end_date FROM HydropowerProjects ORDER BY budget DESC
SELECT project_name, location, SUM(amount) AS total_expenses FROM HydropowerProjects JOIN CostAnalysis ON HydropowerProjects.id = CostAnalysis.project_id GROUP BY project_name, location

SELECT project_name, location, expense_type, amount, date FROM HydropowerProjects JOIN CostAnalysis ON HydropowerProjects.id = CostAnalysis.project_id WHERE amount > 5000 AND date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT * FROM hydropower_projects;
SELECT id, project_name, location FROM hydropower_projects;
SELECT project_name, estimated_budget, actual_cost FROM hydropower_projects;
SELECT * FROM hydropower_projects WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_name, location, estimated_budget FROM hydropower_projects ORDER BY estimated_budget DESC;
SELECT * FROM hydropower_projects WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, project_name, location FROM hydropower_projects WHERE estimated_budget > 1000000;
SELECT project_name, actual_cost FROM hydropower_projects WHERE end_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM hydropower_projects WHERE location = 'California' AND estimated_budget < 5000000;
SELECT id, project_name, start_date, actual_cost FROM hydropower_projects WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM hydropower_projects;
SELECT project_name, location, start_date FROM hydropower_projects WHERE budget > 100000;
SELECT project_name, end_date, budget FROM hydropower_projects WHERE start_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT project_id, project_name, location FROM hydropower_projects WHERE cost_estimate BETWEEN 50000 AND 100000;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date, budget, cost_estimate FROM hydropower_projects WHERE location = 'California';
SELECT project_name, location, start_date, end_date FROM hydropower_projects;
SELECT * FROM project_expenses WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY expense_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, SUM(budget) AS total_budget, COUNT(*) AS total_projects FROM hydropower_projects GROUP BY project_name;
SELECT project_name, personnel_name, job_title, salary FROM hydropower_projects JOIN project_personnel ON hydropower_projects.project_id = project_personnel.project_id;

SELECT project_name, revenue_date, revenue_description, amount FROM hydropower_projects JOIN project_revenues ON hydropower_projects.project_id = project_revenues.project_id WHERE amount BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000;
SELECT * FROM hydropower_projects;
SELECT project_id, project_name, location FROM hydropower_projects WHERE budget > 10000;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date FROM hydropower_projects WHERE location = 'California';
SELECT project_id, project_name, budget FROM hydropower_projects WHERE budget < cost_analysis;
SELECT project_id, project_name, cost_analysis FROM hydropower_projects ORDER BY cost_analysis DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT project_name, location, start_date, end_date FROM hydropower_projects WHERE budget > 100000 ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT task_name, task_description, start_date, end_date, actual_hours FROM project_tasks WHERE estimated_hours > 50 ORDER BY end_date ASC
SELECT expense_description, amount, expense_date FROM expenses WHERE amount < 5000 ORDER BY expense_date DESC
SELECT name, role, department FROM staff WHERE role = 'Engineer' ORDER BY department, name
SELECT project_id, file_name, file_type, file_size FROM project_files ORDER BY file_size ASC
